availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: William T. Green (Lincoln County, Kentucky, farmer)

body.p: Lincoln County, Kentucky, farmer. Kentucky native. Son of Henry Green and Mary Green. Married to Rhoda Welsh Green in Lincoln County, Kentucky, on July 20, 1852. Father of Bettie Green, Mary Green, and Henry Green. Merchant in Lincoln County, Kentucky, in 1850. Farmer in Lincoln County in 1860. Farmer in Lincoln County in 1863.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Lincoln County, District 2, p. 298A.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Lincoln County, p. 65.
Consolidated Lists of Civil War Draft Registration Records, Records of the Provost Marshal General's Bureau (Civil War), NARA RG 110, Lincoln County, KY, July 1863, p. 4.
Kentucky Birth, Marriage and Death Records (1852-1910), KDLA, Frankfort, KY, Roll 994045, Lincoln County Marriages.
Kentucky Marriage Records, Madison County Courthouse, Richmond, Kentucky, Lincoln County Marriages, Film 001904136, p. 7.
Lineage Book of the Charter Members of the National Society of the Daughters of the American Revolution, eds. Mary S. Lockwood and Susan Riviere Hetzel (Washington, D. C.: National Society of the Daughters of the American Revolution, 1891-1939) vol. 148: 1919, p. 207.
"William T. Green (1824-1886)," Find A Grave, Memorial 45435524, accessed June 23, 2023, http://www.findagrave.com/memorial/45435524.
